product_name: Mountain House Chili Mac With Beef - 2 Servings
long_description: This Mountain House instant entree for 2 people features spicy chili macaroni with beans. Stand-up pouch creates an easy way to cook and eat your meal; made from high-barrier foil, the pouch keeps your meal hot. Just mix contents with boiling water in the pouch provided, let stand for a few minutes, and then serve. Quick and easy meal for camping and backpacking. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: This Mountain House instant entree for 2 people features spicy chili macaroni with beans.
